title: Things that need nerfed.exe
body:
{{champion:84}} -  Laning phase is too good and the lead carries over into post 6. remember when akali had a bad early game and could be zoned and out traded early game ? 
{{champion:22}} - Her passive slow needs to cost mana again.
{{champion:432}} - Damage is way to high
{{champion:164}} Q damage and passive shielding needs adjusted.
{{champion:69}} Her W is one of the most busted abilities in the entire game. giant aoe grounding that also deals damage and enables her to a free E spam   ?? riot please
{{champion:131}} An assassin that can build full ap and still be extremely tanky ???
{{champion:119}} Base damage needs reduced or AD scaling on Q needs reduced.
{{champion:245}} Passive damage is too high.
{{champion:122}} Champ builds full tank and can still 100-0 almost anybody just off raw dps from base stats and passive 
{{champion:9}} E needs nerfed in ARAM, fear last to long
{{champion:114}} Kit is busted and over tuned, Her W is too strong.
{{champion:420}} Does this champ even need an explanation ?
{{champion:59}} Damage ratios need reduced.
{{champion:24}} Remove E and remove hybrid scaling
{{champion:145}} Broken kit, dps way to high, Vayne 10.0, 
{{champion:55}} Remove resets. 
{{champion:10}} ult needs longer cooldown.
{{champion:141}} Damage in both forms needs reduced, 
{{champion:203}} kits too strong, insane dps.
 {{champion:240}} free {{item:3157}} when ever he loses an all in ???
{{champion:7}} Broken over loaded kit, damage to high, and this is pre the pbe revert. and thats just as bad if not worse.
{{champion:236}} AD scaling to high.
{{champion:117}} Champ just needs overhauled.
{{champion:99}} E radius needs reduced, also stop buffing her ultimate every other patch. 
{{champion:11}} Make targetable in alpha, or at the very least take dmage from dots, and not block tower shots. true damage is too high 
{{champion:267}} ap ratio on w needs reduced 
{{champion:61}} ap ratio on q needs reduced 
{{champion:133}} remove near sighted blind
{{champion:107}} AD ratio's needs reduced, leaping from a bush should put that bush on cooldown similar to {{champion:91}} 's E
{{champion:35}} - over buffed kit 
{{champion:14}} base damage to high
{{champion:50}} WAY OVER BUFFED KIT !!!!!! 
{{champion:223}} damage scaling from pasive and grey health needs reduced
{{champion:23}} ulti needs much longer cooldown
{{champion:44}} longer cooldown on ultimate.
{{champion:67}} Kits overloaded, insane high dps.
{{champion:161}} passive dmage needs reduced
{{champion:8}} Ap ratios need reduced 
{{champion:157}} If you wanna nerf yas in my option his E "dash" is the main part of his kit.  I think hes in a ok spot atm. could deff be better or worse.
{{champion:112}} Over buffed kit 
{{champion:238}} Stop buffing Zed every other patch.  

{{item:3041}} Remove item from game 
{{item:3086}} Make a unique item so its not stackable, example{{item:3094}} {{item:3046}} 
{{item:3022}} needs to be melee only item
{{item:3040}} shield needs reduced 
{{item:3146}} Item removed from game 
{{item:3124}} Item needs removed from game.   

There's probably more things that needs nerfed but that's off the top of my head.

replies.body:
"destroy all these champs, but my main he's really fine. You can minimally nerf him if you have to"

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/844/770/e9d.jpg

>

>

Good call....this guy is a low key {{champion:157}} main, no doubt.

Summoner name: "1st time yasuo"



....

Low key lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Alex h8721,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nwK0aVM8,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2018-04-06T23:38:03.894+0000)
>

> 
> 
> 
> ....
> 
> Low key lol.

Got me there...

> [{quoted}](name=1st Time Yasuo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nwK0aVM8,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-04-06T22:51:46.379+0000)
>
> {{champion:99}} stop buffing her ultimate every other patch

I mean, I can agree with this...

>or at the very least take dmage from dots

yi already gets damaged by them during his q

Ashe and nerf, pick one please. She has 1 of the more balanced kits for an adc champion (whether you think adc is op or not is entirely up to you). In general, all the champions you selected are harder to play against than some others. I would recommend to understand how to play against those champions even if they might have 0 counterplay (like yi's Q, seriously just fk untargetable instant skills, then again I don't think he's op, at least in high elo).

{{champion:145}} is trash even after her nerfs. She has non-existent damage and needs more buffs to be made viable.

She is as weak as release day {{champion:516}}.

The only champions I agree with in that list are

{{champion:35}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:50}}

> [{quoted}](name=Antenora,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nwK0aVM8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-04-06T23:02:10.894+0000)
>
> The only champions I agree with in that list are
> 
> {{champion:35}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:50}}

That 30% bAD scailing on 13s CD ability when at rank 5 very busted indeed
Leave that to the balance team.

This is why people like the OP will never get a job on a game's balancing team.

Most of the champions listed in there are in a good/reasonable spot.

Yi is so bad dude, why nerf him. I know how stupid it feels when he just eats your damage and kills you but the guy is notorious for being so bad that he has the lowest winrates in every elo. There is obvious counterplay to him that is so strong it makes him unviable.
